titleStmt.title: A true coppy of two severall letters sent by Mr. Richard Osborne (late attendant on his Majesty in Carisbrooke Castle,) touching a designe to poyson his Majesty: which letters were read in the House of Peeres June 19. 1648.
titleStmt.author: Osborne, Richard, fl. 1648.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "21 June London".
In this edition, line 8 on the titlepage ends "Ma-".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
